name: The Dark Forest (Evan Williams)
description:
This is a small level that I was tasked with making for a college assignment. The level I decided to make was a forest level where the player was to use their powers to change between night and day in order to reveal or hide platforms to make it to the end of the level.

If you would like to give feeback the form can be found here!

CONTROLS:

A / DLeft / RightSpace BarJump
LMB (Hold)Change between Night  and Day

All assets used:

ART:

Jungle Tiles, Background and Character

Red and Green Slimes

Background Stars

Background Clouds

Gold Coin

SOUNDS:

Death, Gold Pickup, Level Complete and Footsteps

Level End Wall Sound

Heart of The Jungle (Background Music)

Jump Sound

River Sound

Slime Bounce Sound

UI Sounds
